=== What is it? ===

A event for people in general and/or from the Florida LoCo to get further involved in triaging bugs in Ubuntu for stable and future releases.

This page will provide info about Bug Jams in general and a reoccurring event date.

=== When and where is it? ===

The first event is scheduled for July 12^th^, 2009 between 2 - 6 pm at <nowiki>[[http://tinyurl.com/kpjlcg| Stardust Video & Coffee]]</nowiki>.

<!> Stardust Video & Coffee has a room to accommodate at least 10 people. There is a fine selection of beer, coffee and food.
